divs: Sighting DetailsMy family and I was sitting on the porch..my cousin said "what is that light" we thought it was a plane first but didn't have the usual light it was just a ball of light we watched hover for a few seconds then it going toward the mountians and it disappeard.
Summary: starlike hovering then moved north east then disappeard
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Midvale
There were no other sightings in Midvale on or around August 5th 2013
